name: The Astounding Life of Jakko the Lizard
name_original: The Astounding Life of Jakko the Lizard
description:
Play as Jakko the lizard going on a new adventure through a terrarium fighting off other creatures in turn-based combat.

Esc - Pause

How to Play

Use your 3 Abilities; Melee, Range, and Magic Regen.  Each enemy will have different stats that you must cater your playstyle to.
